verse: Now these were the sons of David who were born for him in Hebron: the firstborn, Amnon, whose mother was Ahinoam from Jezreâ€™el, the second, Daniel, whose mother was Abigail from Carmel,

header: The Royal Line Preserved Through the Captivity

verse: The sons of Jeconiah the captive were Shealtiel his son,
also Malkiram, Pedaiah, Shenazzar, Jekamiah, Hoshama, and Nedabiah.
